item.removed: This entry will be removed when you SUBMIT your changes.

login.label: Login

error.400: The entered login information is not valid.
error.401: The entered login information is not valid.
error.500: There was an error processing the login request. Please try again later.

login.expired: Your login has timed out, please login again.

register.label: Register
register.info: All resource information in GOKb is freely accessible without login! If you would like to actively work in GOKb, please register here and unless directed otherwise send an email with your chosen username and information about your institution to {0}. We will contact you as soon as possible!

validation.valueNotUnique: This value is already in use.
validation.missingSelection: Please select a value from the list.
validation.missingEmail: Please provide a valid email address.
validation.urlNotUnique: This URL is already in use
validation.nameNotUnique: This name is already in use.
validation.dateRange: The end date must be after the start date.
validation.passwordLength: The password must be between 6 and 64 characters of length.

validation.issueRange: The start issue must be before the end issue

validation.missingStartVolume: An end volume requires a set start volume!

dryRun.tooltip: The contents of the KBART file will be matched against the current database to create a report, but they will not be imported.

tipp.description: Fields are preferably taken from imported KBART data

title.description: Fields are preferably taken from enriched reference title data

propId.label: Namespace for title_id values (optional)
propId.tooltip: If the KBART column 'title_id' consistently contains additional identifiers (eg DOIs), they may be added to the package title automatically by selecting the correct type from the list.

addOnly.label: Partial Update
addOnly.tooltip: Don't retire existing titles not matched in this update.

deleteMissing.label: Delete removed titles
deleteMissing.tooltip: Marks all existing titles not matched via this update as 'Deleted'.

errors.encoding: The encoding of this file is not UTF-8. Please correct this before importing!
errors.alreadyRunning: A KBART-Import for this Package is already in progress. Please wait for this job to be finished.
errors.tabsCountFile: This file contains rows with a different column count than defined by the provided headings!
errors.tabsCountRow: This line contains {0} columns instead of {1} columns, as defined by the headings!
errors.correctedVal: Value '{0}' will be automatically replaced by '{1}'
errors.replacementChars: This file contains the illegal character '�', which points to a failed conversion to UTF-8.
errors.replacementCharsRow: This line contains the illegal character '�', which points to a failed conversion to UTF-8.
errors.unusualChars: This line contains unusual characters, which may point to a corrupted file conversion.
errors.unusualCharsVal: Value '{0}' contains unusual characters. This may point to a corrupted file conversion.
errors.illegalType: Value in column 'publication_type' must be 'Serial' or 'Monograph'!
errors.illegalOnlineId: Value for online identifier '{0}' is not valid.
errors.illegalPrintId: Value for print identifier '{0}' is not valid.
errors.longVal: Value {0} is unusually long for this column.
errors.shortRow: This line contains fewer columns than defined by the provided headings!
errors.noIds: This line contains no usable identifiers!
errors.noTitleId: This line does not contain a value for the common title id!
errors.noImportIds: This line contains no reference identifiers (print/online), and no default namespace was selected!
errors.noAuthIds: This line contains neither a 'print_identifier' nor an 'online_identifier'!

validator.label: KBART Validator
validator.info: In strict mode, KBART validation is performed strictly according to the NISO standard. In non-strict mode, values automatically interpolated by the GOKb are also accepted (according to the validation during package upload).

newPassConfirm.nomatch: The new passwords do not match

titleMerge.label: Identifier check & Duplicate cleanup
titleMerge.toDo: Please check the title information (name/identifiers) for errors. If there are duplicate titles, you may merge them by first selecting a surviving 'merge target' and then the duplicate to be deleted via 'merge duplicate'.

titleReview.label: Identifier check
titleReview.toDo: Please check the title information (name/identifiers) for errors.

confirm.label: Confirm Merge
confirm.message: Please confirm that you want to merge the reviewed title ({0}) into the selected one. The review will be closed and the reviewed title will be deleted.

selectIds.label: Select IDs to add to the merged title.

single.selectIds: Select IDs to mark them for removal.

confirm.label: Confirm title changes
confirm.message: Please confirm the updates you have prepared for {0}.

confirmMerge.label: Confirm Merge
confirmMerge.message: Please confirm the title merge. The reference title {0} will be deleted and all of its linked package titles will be transferred to the selected title.

confirmLink.label: Confirm Linking
confirmLink.message: Please confirm the linking of the global title {0} with the package title.

lookup.label: Add another title to the selection

success.label: The reference title has been successfully linked to the package title.

add.label: Generate new title
add.message: Please confirm the creation of a new reference title with ALL remaining identifiers of the reviewed package title.

Invalid TIPPs.label: Invalid Package Titles
Invalid TIPPs.info: An update for this package failed because of invalid package title information.
Invalid TIPPs.toDo: Check records for erroneous or missing information.

Major Identifier Mismatch.label: Major Identifier Mismatch
Major Identifier Mismatch.info: Title {0} was matched on one identifier, but at least one other ingest identifier differs from existing ones in the same namespace.
Major Identifier Mismatch.toDo: Check if the new title is correct. Merge titles if necessary. Check identifiers and delete them if they are incorrect.

Minor Identifier Mismatch.label: Minor Identifier Mismatch
Minor Identifier Mismatch.info: Title {0} matched, but ingest identifiers {1} differ from existing ones in the same namespaces.
Minor Identifier Mismatch.toDo: Check identifiers and delete the incorrect identifiers if necessary.

Multiple Matches.label: Multiple Matches
Multiple Matches.info: Multiple titles ({0}) were matched on one identifier, but none matched for all given identifiers.
Multiple Matches.toDo: Check if the new title is correct. Merge titles if necessary. Check identifiers and delete them if they are incorrect.

Name Mismatch.label: Name Mismatch
Name Mismatch.info: Title {0} was matched via secondary id, but had a different name.
Name Mismatch.action: New title name added as variant of existing title name
Name Mismatch.toDo: Check if the title name is a valid alternative.

Name Similarity.label: Name Similarity
Name Similarity.info: No matched title via identifiers, but a title with a similar name already exists.
Name Similarity.toDo: Check if the new title is correct. Merge titles if necessary. Check identifiers and delete them if they are incorrect.

Namespace Mismatch.label: ISSN Conflict
Namespace Mismatch.info: A package title eISSN matched an existing reference title print-ISSN or vice versa.
Namespace Mismatch.action: The package title was created with a conflicting identifier.
Namespace Mismatch.toDo: Check if the reference title has a print-ISSN erroneously marked as eISSN or vice versa and correct those identifiers if necessary. If the package title identifiers are wrong, please contact the provider of the KBART file and ask for the information to be fixed.

New Org.label: New Org
New Org.info: A title with an unknown publisher has been imported.

New Platform.label: New Platform
New Platform.info: The platform did not exist and was newly created.

Platform Noncurrent.label: Platform Noncurrent
Platform Noncurrent.info: The existing platform {0} matched for this package title is marked as {1}.
Platform Noncurrent.action: Package title with platform {0} was created/updated
Platform Noncurrent.toDo: Review the URL/platform for validity. Link the package title to the correct platform if necessary.

Removed Identifier.label: Removed Identifier
Removed Identifier.info: Identifier {0} was previously connected to {1}, but has since been manually removed.

Status Deleted.label: Status Deleted
Status Deleted.info: This {0} was previously marked as 'Deleted', but has now been set back to 'Current' again.

Status Retired.label: Status Retired
Status Retired.info: This {0} was previously marked as 'Retired', but has now been set back to 'Current' again.

TIPPs Retired.label: Package Titles Retired
TIPPs Retired.info: An update to package {0} did not contain {1} previously existing package titles.

Type Mismatch.label: Type Mismatch
Type Mismatch.info: A provided identifier matched an existing title of another type (i.e. a book identifier matched a journal or vice versa).
Type Mismatch.toDo: Check if the title has the correct type (book, journal etc.) and change it if necessary.

Ambiguous Matches.label: Ambiguous Matches
Ambiguous Matches.info: Multiple titles were matched on all identifiers.
Ambiguous Matches.toDo: Check titles for duplicates. Merge titles if necessary. Check identifier duplicates and delete them if they are incorrect.

Package Titles Retired.label: Package Titles Retired
Package Titles Retired.info: An update to package {0} did not contain {1} previously existing package titles.

Invalid Package Titles.label: Invalid Package Titles
Invalid Package Titles.info: An update for this package failed because of invalid package title information.
Invalid Package Titles.toDo: Check records for erroneous or missing information.

Multiple EZB Results.label: Multiple EZB Results
Multiple EZB Results.info: There were multiple EZB results for this title.
Multiple EZB Results.toDo: Select a EZB entry from the candidates.

Multiple ZDB Results.label: Multiple ZDB Results
Multiple ZDB Results.info: There were multiple ZDB results for this title.
Multiple ZDB Results.toDo: Select a ZDB entry from the candidates.

Coverage Mismatch.label: Coverage Mismatch
Coverage Mismatch.info: The matched global title reference has conflicting publishing dates to the coverage of this item.
Coverage Mismatch.toDo: Manually link the existing match or create a new title for linking.

EZB Title Overlap.label: EZB Label Mismatch
EZB Title Overlap.info: Matched EZB-ID is already linked to another title instance.

ZDB Title Overlap.label: ZDB Label Mismatch
ZDB Title Overlap.info: Matched ZDB-ID is already linked to another title instance.
ZDB Title Overlap.toDo: Check reference titles for duplicates and merge them if necessary. Check eISSN identifiers.

No EZB Results.label: No EZB Matches
No EZB Results.info: No EZB-IDs found for given ISSNs

No ZDB Results.label: No ZDB Matches
No ZDB Results.info: No ZDB-IDs found for given ISSNs

Merged ZDB titles.label: Multiple ZDB-IDs Linked
Merged ZDB titles.info: ZDB synchronisation skipped because the title has multiple ZDB-IDs linked

Ambiguous Title Matches.label: Ambiguous Title Matches
Ambiguous Title Matches.info: Based on the available identifiers the package title cannot be uniquely assigned to a reference title.
Ambiguous Title Matches.action: The GOKb could not link a reference title.
Ambiguous Title Matches.toDo: Check if there are duplicates in the reference titles. Select the correct title.

step1.label: Step 1: ID check & component cleanup
step1.toDo: Check whether there are duplicates for the reference titles. If this is the case, merge them by first selecting a reference title via 'Select merge target' and then clicking on 'Merge duplicate'. All remaining identifiers of the title to be deleted will be taken over. If there is no duplicate, check the identifiers and delete any that are incorrect. Once the cleanup is complete, you can move to the next step.

step2.label: Step 2: Title linking
step2.toDo: Via 'Select linking target' you can select a reference title to link to the package title to be checked. If none of the offered reference titles matches the package title, you can either use the search mask of the last tile to find the matching reference title or create a new reference title based on the data of the package title by using the corresponding button. Then select this as the target. Confirm the link via the corresponding button.

Namespace Conflict.label: ISSN Conflict
Namespace Conflict.info: The package title has an e-ISSN that corresponds to an existing p-ISSN of the reference title, or vice versa.
Namespace Conflict.action: The GOKb created p-ISSN and e-ISSN with the same value.
Namespace Conflict.toDo: In the package title, check if a p-ISSN has been marked as an e-ISSN or vice versa and correct it by deleting the incorrect ISSNs. You can add new identifiers by opening the detailed view of the title in a new tab by clicking on the title. Likewise, check the reference title and correct the ISSNs there. If the package title was imported via a KBART file, contact the provider and point out the incorrect ISSN.

Critical Identifier Conflict.label: Reference Title Conflict
Critical Identifier Conflict.info: A new reference title was created due to an identifier conflict. The new reference title matches an existing reference title based on at least one identifier while other identifiers do not match. In addition, the reference title name differs significantly.
Critical Identifier Conflict.action: The GOKb created a new reference title using the identifiers of the package title. The package title was linked to the new reference title.
Critical Identifier Conflict.toDo: Check for duplicates in the reference titles. If this is the case, merge them by first selecting a reference title via 'Select Merge Target' and then clicking on 'Merge Duplicate'. All remaining identifiers of the title to be deleted will be taken over. If there is no duplicate, check the identifiers and delete any that are incorrect.

Secondary Identifier Conflict.label: Identifier Conflict (ID added)
Secondary Identifier Conflict.info: When matching with a reference title, an identifier was found that does not match the existing identifiers of the reference title. Nevertheless, it seems to be the same title because, for example, the name matches.
Secondary Identifier Conflict.action: The GOKb has added the identifier in the reference title.
Secondary Identifier Conflict.toDo: Check identifiers of the reference title and remove the incorrect identifiers if necessary.

Generic Matching Conflict.label: Generic Matching Conflict
Generic Matching Conflict.info: There has been a conflict matching the package title with an existing reference title.
Generic Matching Conflict.toDo: Check all titles and contact the GOKb team if necessary.

Invalid Record.label: Invalid KBART Record
Invalid Record.info: There have been invalid values in a KBART file record. No package title has been created.
Invalid Record.toDo: Check the KBART file record and correct the invalid values.

Ambiguous Record Matches.label: Ambiguous KBART Record Matches
Ambiguous Record Matches.info: A KBART record has been matched on multiple package titles.
Ambiguous Record Matches.toDo: Check the KBART record and the package title if the correct package title has been selected.

Import Identifier Mismatch.label: Import Identifier Mismatch
Import Identifier Mismatch.info: A KBART record could be matched to an existing package title based on one or more identifiers, but one or more other identifiers differ.
Import Identifier Mismatch.action: The GOKb created a new package title.
Import Identifier Mismatch.toDo: Review the identifiers of the package titles. If you find any errors, they should ideally be corrected by importing a corrected KBART file. In this case, you can first delete the erroneous package title(s) via their detail view. Alternatively, you can also delete incorrect identifiers manually here.

Import Report.label: Report on KBART Import
Import Report.info: A KBART File has been imported. Please check the details for further information.

Invalid Name.label: Invalid Name
Invalid Name.info: The name of this title contains incorrect characters (represented by placeholder �).
Invalid Name.action: The GOKb created the name with placeholders (�) for incorrect characters.
Invalid Name.toDo: Correct the name of the title by clicking on the pencil icon next to the title name. Complete the editing by selecting the check mark. Confirm your changes by clicking on 'Confirm title changes'. Please also check the names of any linked reference titles/package titles.

Invalid Indentifiers.label: Invalid Identifiers
Invalid Indentifiers.info: There are invalid identifiers linked to this component!
Invalid Indentifiers.toDo: Please delete invalid identifiers and replace them with the correct ones.

error.duplicate: A similar variant to '{0}' already exists!
error.inUse: This variant is already in use elsewhere!

source.label: Settings for Automated Import and Update |  Settings for Automated Imports and Updates

delete.confirm: Please note that this status is reserved for erroneous entries and will trigger changes that cannot be simply reversed.

copy.label: Copy stable URL to clipboard
copy.success: The stable URL has been copied to your clipboard!
